settings.text: Trampoline took shape because of our love, sense of nostalgia and knowledge about all things home decor. As founders that grew up in India, we were always in awe of artisans and the craftsmanship of making exceptional home decor across our country. As a global team today, we not only value everything that goes into making great products, but also the art and science of making great selections available across borders, directly from source to you. We care about enabling businesses of all shapes and sizes and about doing everything we do with sustainability at the core of it. We’re a bunch of passionate decor creators, curators and home & living business nerds, bringing seamless access to high quality decor that’s on trend, and suits your unique style. We believe our collections are conversation starters, and that Trampoline makes for the cosiest environment for having a conversation. Write to us, share your thoughts and feedback. We’re new and we'd love to hear from you.

settings.heading: Design Led
settings.text: Some trends are evergreen, others change faster than London weather. We cater to both. We want to enable our customers to keep unique products with lower MOQs in their stores.

settings.heading: QC Standardization
settings.text: 100% ownership of quality control across production, sampling, packaging and delivery - so what you get is perfect. Our on-ground team conducts thorough physical inspection of all partner factories to verify their manufacturing capabilities and compliance with QC processes.

settings.heading: Seamless Delivery
settings.text: We deliver a transparent end-to-end service for both Made To Order and In Stock products. You’ll have full visibility of timelines for your orders, all the way from production, QC and shipment to doorstep delivery.

settings.heading: Relationship focussed
settings.text: We want to do this forever and help take your business to new heights while we’re at it. Our direct sourcing model removes multiple middlemen and brings transparency to the buying process, enabling higher markups for our customers.
